rows.business_item_short_description: A cloud service supporting modern business and developers.
rows.business_item_long_description: Azure is a cloud service included in the Intelligent Cloud segment that supports modern business and developers by providing cloud infrastructure and AI offerings. It is part of the server products and cloud services offered by Microsoft.
rows.evidence_span: It primarily consists of server products and cloud services such as Azure, GitHub, Nuance Healthcare cloud services

rows.business_item_short_description: A cloud service supporting modern business and developers.
rows.business_item_long_description: GitHub is a cloud service included in the Intelligent Cloud segment that supports modern business and developers by providing cloud infrastructure and AI offerings. It is part of the server products and cloud services offered by Microsoft.
rows.evidence_span: It primarily consists of server products and cloud services such as Azure, GitHub, Nuance Healthcare cloud services

rows.business_item_long_description: Nuance Healthcare cloud services are part of the Intelligent Cloud segment, providing specialized cloud services for the healthcare industry. These services support modern business and developers with cloud infrastructure and AI offerings.
rows.evidence_span: It primarily consists of server products and cloud services such as Azure, GitHub, Nuance Healthcare cloud services

rows.business_item_short_description: Enterprise and partner services supporting IT professionals.
rows.business_item_long_description: Enterprise Support Services are part of the Intelligent Cloud segment's enterprise and partner services. They focus on enhancing productivity and efficiency for IT professionals and developers through professional services.
rows.evidence_span: enterprise and partner services including Enterprise Support Services and Microsoft Partner Network

rows.business_item_short_description: A network of enterprise and partner services.
rows.business_item_long_description: Microsoft Partner Network is included in the Intelligent Cloud segment as part of enterprise and partner services. It supports IT professionals and developers by providing professional services and enhancing productivity and efficiency.
rows.evidence_span: enterprise and partner services including Enterprise Support Services and Microsoft Partner Network

rows.business_item_short_description: Windows OEM licensing is part of the Windows and Devices products.
rows.business_item_long_description: Windows OEM licensing is included in the Windows and Devices category within the More Personal Computing segment, focusing on personal technology experiences. It supports consistent user experiences across devices.
rows.evidence_span: It comprises Windows and Devices (including Windows OEM licensing and Surface devices)

rows.business_item_short_description: Surface devices are included in the Windows and Devices products.
rows.business_item_long_description: Surface devices are part of the Windows and Devices category in the More Personal Computing segment, contributing to personal technology experiences and consistent user experiences across devices.
rows.evidence_span: It comprises Windows and Devices (including Windows OEM licensing and Surface devices)

rows.business_item_short_description: Xbox hardware is part of the Gaming products.
rows.business_item_long_description: Xbox hardware is included in the Gaming category within the More Personal Computing segment, which focuses on expanding gaming ecosystems and delivering consistent user experiences.
rows.evidence_span: Gaming (Xbox hardware, content, subscriptions, and cloud gaming)

rows.business_item_short_description: Xbox content and subscriptions are part of the Gaming products.
rows.business_item_long_description: Xbox content and subscriptions are included in the Gaming category, supporting the expansion of gaming ecosystems and providing consistent user experiences across devices.
rows.evidence_span: Gaming (Xbox hardware, content, subscriptions, and cloud gaming)

rows.business_item_short_description: Xbox cloud gaming is part of the Gaming products.
rows.business_item_long_description: Xbox cloud gaming is included in the Gaming category within the More Personal Computing segment, enabling cloud-based gaming experiences and ecosystem expansion.
rows.evidence_span: Gaming (Xbox hardware, content, subscriptions, and cloud gaming)

rows.business_item_short_description: Bing is part of the Search and news advertising products.
rows.business_item_long_description: Bing is included in the Search and news advertising category within the More Personal Computing segment, providing relevant advertising solutions and consistent user experiences.
rows.evidence_span: Search and news advertising (Bing, Copilot, Microsoft News, Microsoft Edge)

rows.business_item_short_description: Copilot is part of the Search and news advertising products.
rows.business_item_long_description: Copilot is included in the Search and news advertising category, contributing to relevant advertising solutions and consistent user experiences across devices.
rows.evidence_span: Search and news advertising (Bing, Copilot, Microsoft News, Microsoft Edge)

rows.business_item_short_description: Microsoft News is part of the Search and news advertising products.
rows.business_item_long_description: Microsoft News is included in the Search and news advertising category within the More Personal Computing segment, supporting relevant advertising solutions and consistent user experiences.
rows.evidence_span: Search and news advertising (Bing, Copilot, Microsoft News, Microsoft Edge)

rows.business_item_short_description: Microsoft Edge is part of the Search and news advertising products.
rows.business_item_long_description: Microsoft Edge is included in the Search and news advertising category, providing relevant advertising solutions and consistent user experiences across devices.
rows.evidence_span: Search and news advertising (Bing, Copilot, Microsoft News, Microsoft Edge)

rows.business_item_short_description: A suite of productivity products and cloud services for commercial users.
rows.business_item_long_description: Microsoft 365 Commercial includes productivity and cloud services designed to enhance business processes and communication across devices and platforms. It is part of the segment's focus on AI-powered business productivity tools.
rows.evidence_span: It includes Microsoft 365 Commercial and Consumer products and cloud services

rows.business_item_short_description: A suite of productivity products and cloud services for consumer users.
rows.business_item_long_description: Microsoft 365 Consumer offers productivity and cloud services tailored for individual consumers, enabling communication and information services across devices and platforms.
rows.evidence_span: It includes Microsoft 365 Commercial and Consumer products and cloud services

rows.business_item_short_description: A professional networking platform with various business solutions.
rows.business_item_long_description: LinkedIn provides professional networking services along with Talent, Marketing, Premium, and Sales Solutions. It supports intelligent business applications to empower organizations and individuals.
rows.evidence_span: LinkedIn with its Talent, Marketing, Premium, and Sales Solutions

rows.business_item_short_description: Enterprise resource planning and customer relationship management applications.
rows.business_item_long_description: Dynamics products and cloud services include Dynamics 365 ERP and CRM applications that provide intelligent business applications to empower organizations and individuals.
rows.evidence_span: Dynamics products and cloud services such as Dynamics 365 ERP and CRM applications
